page.title: 06A Day in my Life
page.content: After lunch we played Hide and seek and Monsters. When I was Monster I caught Debbie and Michelle. In the afternoon we corrected work and had a spelling test. Before we finished Mrs Orr told us the end of the story she was reading to us. When I got home I watched the television. At teatime I had chips, peas and a small pie and a hot cup of refreshing tea. I went for Margo. We went down for Debbie. We had a great night. There was Margo, Shonagh, Debbie, Sharron and I. At 8.30pm I said "Goodbye" to Shonagh and I set off down the road. I met Miss Macphail, our Headteacher, on my way home. I had a drink of milk and toast for my supper. I got washed and changed into my nightie. I got into bed and hoped tomorrow would be another great day like today.
